message.content:
1. Outcomes were recorded during 24 hours after surgery.
2. Numerical Rating Scale (NRS) pain scores were one of the outcomes recorded.
3. The NRS pain scores range from 0–10.
4. Cumulative opioid consumption was one of the outcomes recorded.
5. The first analgesic request time was one of the outcomes recorded.

messages.content:
Statement: The main outcomes recorded during 24 hours after surgery were Numerical Rating Scale (NRS) pain scores (NRS, 0–10), cumulative opioid consumption, and the first analgesic request time.
